artefact: Book, change and cancel theory tests for your pupils

artefact.overview: Book and manage car, motorcycle, lorry, bus and Driver Certificate of Professional Competence theory tests for your pupils
artefact.more_information:
You’ll also need the following from the Driving Standards Agency:

- business ID
- username
- password

You can book test slots up to 3 months in advance. You won’t have to give the candidate’s details when you book the tests.

% You must confirm the details of the candidate taking the test by 4pm a full working day before the test, eg by 4pm on Wednesday if the test is on Friday. %

^ Sundays and public holidays are not counted as working days. ^

##Cancel or change a test

You must give at least 3 clear working days notice when cancelling or changing a test to get a refund.

^ There's a different process to follow to [book, change and cancel theory tests](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/theory-test "Book, change and cancel theory tests"){:rel="external"} in Northern Ireland. ^
artefact.introduction: Book and manage car, motorcycle, lorry, bus and Driver Certificate of Professional Competence theory tests for your pupils. You’ll need to be [registered to use the trainer booking facility](register-to-book-driving-tests-as-trainer-or-business "Register as a DSA trainer booker") for theory tests.

details.description: Becoming an instructor, applying for licences, booking tests and rules

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

artefact.title: Book, change and cancel theory tests for your trainee instructors
Register to book driving tests as a trainer or business
